original: 阿唎多羅陀羅尼阿嚕力經🔽開府儀同三司特進試鴻臚卿肅國
analyzed: 阿唎多羅陀羅尼阿嚕力經 開府儀同三司特進試鴻臚卿肅國
translated: The Aritara Dhāraṇī Sūtra of Āruṇey🔽Kaifuyi Tongsi, Tejin Shihonglu Qing, Suiguo

original: 公食邑三千戶賜紫贈司空諡大鑒
analyzed: 公食邑三千戶賜紫贈司空諡大鑒
translated: Gong Shiyi Qianhu Cizeng Sigong Shini Dajian

original: 正號大廣智大興善寺三藏沙門不空奉　詔譯如是我聞。
analyzed: 正號大廣智大興善寺三藏沙門不空奉　詔譯如是我聞。
translated: Zheng Hao Da Guangzhi Daxingshansi Sazang Shamen Bukong Translated by Imperial Decree Thus have I heard.

original: 一時婆伽梵在悉羅跋城給孤獨園。
analyzed: 一時婆伽梵在悉羅跋城給孤獨園。
translated: Once the Bhagavān was in the Anāthapiṇḍada Park in the city of Śrāvastī.
He was together with an assembly of innumerable bodhisattvas.
At that time, Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva

original: 於大眾中從座而起。🔽正衣服已偏袒右肩。
analyzed: 於大眾中從座而起。 正衣服已偏袒右肩。
translated: rose from his seat in the great assembly.🔽He adjusted his robes and bared his right shoulder.
He touched his right knee to the ground, joined his palms in respect,
bowed his head to the Buddha's feet, and said to the Buddha,

original: 世尊我今欲說能成一切三世勝法。
analyzed: 世尊我今欲說能成一切三世勝法。
translated: World-Honored One, I now wish to speak the supreme Dharma of the three times that can accomplish all things.
I only pray that the World-Honored One will kindly allow it.

original: 爾時世尊讚言善哉善哉摩訶薩埵。
analyzed: 爾時世尊讚言善哉善哉摩訶薩埵。
translated: At that time, the World-Honored One praised, saying, Excellent, excellent! Mahāsattva!
For the sake of greatly benefiting all sentient beings,
Wishing to expound such a secret Dharma treasury,
I now grant permission to speak extensively as you wish.

original: 爾時觀自在菩薩即說真言曰。
analyzed: 爾時觀自在菩薩即說真言曰。
translated: At that time, Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva spoke the mantra, saying:

original: 唵阿嚕力迦半音呼之娑嚩二合引訶引爾時觀自在菩薩說此真言已。
analyzed: 唵阿嚕力迦半音呼之娑嚩二合引訶引爾時觀自在菩薩說此真言已。
translated: Oṃ arulika (pronounced softly) svāhā. At that time, after Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva spoke this mantra,

original: 而白佛言世尊此真言是一切蓮花部心。
analyzed: 而白佛言世尊此真言是一切蓮花部心。
translated: he addressed the Buddha, saying, World-Honored One, this mantra is the heart of all lotus families.
I will now explain the method for accomplishing spiritual powers.
If one recites it eight thousand times every morning in front of my image,

original: 作曼荼羅散種種花。🔽誦八千遍。
analyzed: 作曼荼羅散種種花。 誦八千遍。
translated: creating a maṇḍala and scattering various flowers,
and then does not speak with others but recites more,
one will gradually become more retentive.
If one follows this method and is able to do it for six months,
one will become greatly intelligent.
Whatever words one hears will all be remembered without forgetting.
If one bathes purely
and creates three circular altars in front of the Buddha,
one for the Buddha, one for the Dharma, and one for the Saṅgha,
making offerings of flowers and incense according to the Dharma,
If one holds an incense burner and burns incense,
and recites it 8,000 times,

original: 應墮地獄四重五逆一切重罪無不消滅。
analyzed: 應墮地獄四重五逆一切重罪無不消滅。
translated: all grave offenses such as the four grave offenses and the five heinous crimes that would lead to falling into hell will be eliminated without fail.
There is no doubt about it.

original: 若滿六月每誦一千五百遍。
analyzed: 若滿六月每誦一千五百遍。
translated: If one recites it 1,500 times every day for six months,
all siddhis that one seeks will be accomplished.
Furthermore, after bathing,
sit on a seat of three-cornered grass,
and recite it 350,000 times.
There is no siddhi that will not be attained.

original: 仍離自身一切病必無橫疾。
analyzed: 仍離自身一切病必無橫疾。
translated: Moreover, one will be free from all illnesses of the body and will definitely not suffer from unexpected ailments.

original: 若於觀自在菩薩前連誦一萬。
analyzed: 若於觀自在菩薩前連誦一萬。
translated: If one recites it 10,000 times in front of Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva,
all good wishes that one seeks will be accomplished.

original: 又法白月八日或十五日。
analyzed: 又法白月八日或十五日。
translated: Furthermore, on the eighth or fifteenth day of the bright half of the month,
bathe and recite it 8,000 times.
One will be able to avoid all unexpected difficulties in the world,
and all demonic obstacles will be completely eliminated.

original: 又從白月一日至十五日受八戒。
analyzed: 又從白月一日至十五日受八戒。
translated: Moreover, from the first to the fifteenth day of the bright half of the month, observe the eight precepts,

original: 日誦一萬遍能離一切毘那野迦所障礙難。
analyzed: 日誦一萬遍能離一切毘那野迦所障礙難。
translated: Reciting it ten thousand times a day can remove all obstacles and difficulties caused by Vinayaka.

original: 又正月一日起首至十五日。
analyzed: 又正月一日起首至十五日。
translated: Also, starting from the first day of the first month until the fifteenth day,
in front of the Buddha, one should purify the maṇḍala.
Make offerings of incense and flowers.
Recite it thirty-five thousand times.
One can attain siddhi and fulfill all wishes.
Also, in the morning, wash with fragrant water.
Recite it three thousand five hundred times.
It can cause all people to respect and love one.
All sought-after matters will be accomplished as one wishes.
Also, first recite it ten thousand times in front of the Buddha.

original: 然從一日起首乃至十四日誦十萬遍。
analyzed: 然從一日起首乃至十四日誦十萬遍。
translated: Then, starting from the first day up to the fourteenth day, recite it one hundred thousand times.
Far away from all evil obstacles and difficulties.
Also, if there are good men and women,

original: 於佛前及觀自在等諸菩薩前。
analyzed: 於佛前及觀自在等諸菩薩前。
translated: in front of the Buddha and Avalokitêśvara and other bodhisattvas,
make a maṇḍala.
Make offerings of anointing incense, burning incense, flowers, and lamps.
Recite it three thousand five hundred times.

original: 捨身必生觀自在菩薩足下。
analyzed: 捨身必生觀自在菩薩足下。
translated: One will definitely be reborn under the feet of Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva.
Moreover, one should first build 100,000 stupas.

original: 於一一塔前誦一萬遍如法供養者。
analyzed: 於一一塔前誦一萬遍如法供養者。
translated: In front of each stupa, recite 10,000 times and make offerings according to the Dharma.
All siddhis that are sought will be attained.

original: 捨身已任意往生極樂世界。
analyzed: 捨身已任意往生極樂世界。
translated: After giving up the body, one can be reborn in the Land of Ultimate Bliss as one wishes.

original: 又以蟻封泥作十萬小塔。
analyzed: 又以蟻封泥作十萬小塔。
translated: Moreover, use ant-hill clay to make 100,000 small stupas.

original: 一一塔前誦三千五百遍。
analyzed: 一一塔前誦三千五百遍。
translated: In front of each stupa, recite 3,500 times.
The siddhis that are sought will be the most supreme.
All that is thought of in the mind will be attained.

original: 其人先造四重五逆大罪。
analyzed: 其人先造四重五逆大罪。
translated: If a person has previously committed the grave offenses of the four grave and five heinous crimes,
following this will not fail to eliminate them.

original: 命終任意往生極樂國土。
analyzed: 命終任意往生極樂國土。
translated: At the end of life, one can be reborn in the Land of Ultimate Bliss as one wishes.

original: 又以前泥於佛前作曼荼羅。
analyzed: 又以前泥於佛前作曼荼羅。
translated: Moreover, use the same clay to make a maṇḍala in front of the Buddha.
Burn agarwood incense.

original: 別取好花每一誦一擲佛足。
analyzed: 別取好花每一誦一擲佛足。
translated: Take good flowers and throw one each time you recite, at the Buddha's feet.
Three times a day for seven days.

original: 能滅一切決定墮地獄罪。
analyzed: 能滅一切決定墮地獄罪。
translated: It can eliminate all offenses that will definitely lead to hell.
One will also attain all sought-after siddhis.
Also, do not ask about the good or bad of the sun and moon.

original: 但取中夜香湯洗浴著新淨衣。
analyzed: 但取中夜香湯洗浴著新淨衣。
translated: Just take a fragrant bath at midnight, put on new clean clothes,
and recite [the mantra] 3,500 times.
All bad dreams will be eliminated.

original: 心所求事夢中皆說一一分明必不錯謬。
analyzed: 心所求事夢中皆說一一分明必不錯謬。
translated: Whatever one seeks in one's mind will all be explained in dreams, one by one, clearly and without error.
Also, in front of me, make a maṇḍala.

original: 如牛皮法師云大小如牛皮或方或圓二肘三肘作之然牛酥燈八盞。
analyzed: 如牛皮法師云大小如牛皮或方或圓二肘三肘作之然牛酥燈八盞。
translated: The teacher says it should be the size of an ox's hide, either square or round, two or three cubits in size. Set out eight lamps of ox ghee.
For every ten thousand [recitations], up to one month.
Each day, as before, do not speak to others.

original: 一月已即讀佛大乘經得成不忘。
analyzed: 一月已即讀佛大乘經得成不忘。
translated: After one month, one will be able to memorize the Mahāyāna sūtras read by the Buddha.
One will become extremely intelligent.
One will also see Avalokiteśvara and always hear the Dharma being explained.

original: 又欲得見觀自在菩薩者。
analyzed: 又欲得見觀自在菩薩者。
translated: Also, if one wishes to see Bodhisattva Avalokiteśvara,

original: 於舍利塔中誦二十五萬遍。
analyzed: 於舍利塔中誦二十五萬遍。
translated: in a stūpa containing relics, recite [the mantra] 250,000 times.

original: 然作大供養然牛酥燈坐三稜草。
analyzed: 然作大供養然牛酥燈坐三稜草。
translated: Make great offerings, set out lamps of ox ghee, and sit on three-pronged grass.
Recite the mantra one night until midnight.
The holy one will then appear in person.

original: 行人見已即從座起供養恭敬。
analyzed: 行人見已即從座起供養恭敬。
translated: When the practitioner sees this, they will immediately rise from their seat to make offerings and pay respects.
At that time, the Bodhisattva will expound the Dharma for them.
Having heard the Dharma,
this person will always be inseparable from the holy one.

original: 得不退菩薩地乃至成佛。
analyzed: 得不退菩薩地乃至成佛。
translated: They will attain the stage of non-retrogression as a Bodhisattva and eventually become a Buddha.
Moreover, on the shore of a straight-flowing sea spring,
gather sand to build a koṭi stūpas.

original: 每塔前誦一洛叉有難滅重罪應墮地獄悉滅無餘。
analyzed: 每塔前誦一洛叉有難滅重罪應墮地獄悉滅無餘。
translated: In front of each stūpa, recite one lakh. If there are difficulties and heavy sins that should fall into hell, they will all be extinguished without remainder.

original: 仍見聖者命終生極樂國土速得成佛。
analyzed: 仍見聖者命終生極樂國土速得成佛。
translated: They will also see the holy one and, after death, be reborn in the Land of Ultimate Bliss and quickly attain Buddhahood.
Moreover, build one hundred stūpas each day.
Up to the sixth month, recite the mantra daily.

original: 於其國土一切災難消滅。
analyzed: 於其國土一切災難消滅。
translated: All calamities and difficulties in that country will be eliminated.
Moreover, if you build a koṭi stūpas,
and recite one koṭi times,
you will see Avalokiteśvara and hear the Dharma being expounded.

original: 此人隨所行處有人見者。
analyzed: 此人隨所行處有人見者。
translated: Wherever this person goes, anyone who sees them
One will then attain liberation from all the ocean of suffering.
Also, do not speak.

original: 造眾多塔誦三十五萬遍。
analyzed: 造眾多塔誦三十五萬遍。
translated: Build many stupas and recite 350,000 times.
One will then attain siddhi.

original: 隨所言說恒為法音無不稱意。
analyzed: 隨所言說恒為法音無不稱意。
translated: Whatever one says will always be the sound of the Dharma and will not fail to be in accordance with one's wishes.
Also, build 3,500 stupas each day.
In front of each stupa, recite seven times.

original: 以此功德迴施一切受苦有情。
analyzed: 以此功德迴施一切受苦有情。
translated: Dedicate this merit to all suffering sentient beings.

original: 如是願言應墮惡道受苦業者皆悉消滅。
analyzed: 如是願言應墮惡道受苦業者皆悉消滅。
translated: Those who make such aspirations and should fall into evil realms to suffer will all have their karma extinguished.
Whatever this person sees,
will be respected like a servant.
After death, they will be born in the Land of Bliss.

original: 又於塔中限十五日無數密誦。
analyzed: 又於塔中限十五日無數密誦。
translated: Also, in the stupa, limit the fifteenth day to countless secret recitations.

original: 以此功德迴施一切眾生者。
analyzed: 以此功德迴施一切眾生者。
translated: Dedicate this merit to all sentient beings.

original: 此人所求大願皆得成就。
analyzed: 此人所求大願皆得成就。
translated: Whatever great vows this person seeks will all be accomplished.
First, observe the eight precepts.
Do not speak and recite one koṭi.

original: 得禪地悉地又法於聖者足前誦。
analyzed: 得禪地悉地又法於聖者足前誦。
translated: Attain the siddhi of the stage of dhyāna. Also, in front of the sage's feet, recite.
All accomplishments will be attained.
Moreover, always give rise to a compassionate mind.
Grind sandalwood incense and smear it on a round altar.
Like a lotus leaf.
Up to one laksha.

original: 一一壇前誦三千五百遍。
analyzed: 一一壇前誦三千五百遍。
translated: In front of each altar, recite three thousand five hundred times.
Having done this, read Mahayana sutras.
One will then attain wisdom and intelligence.

original: 心所欲誦多少皆得自在。
analyzed: 心所欲誦多少皆得自在。
translated: Whatever one wishes to recite, much or little, one will attain mastery.

original: 又不語於本尊前誦三十五萬遍。
analyzed: 又不語於本尊前誦三十五萬遍。
translated: Moreover, without speaking, recite thirty-five thousand times in front of the deity.
One will then attain the most supreme wisdom and intelligence.
Moreover, without speaking, give rise to great compassion.

original: 食大麥飯或唯食菜或乞飲食。
analyzed: 食大麥飯或唯食菜或乞飲食。
translated: Eat barley rice, or only eat vegetables or beg for food and drink.
Recite each syllable fifteen thousand times.
All wishes and aspirations will be fulfilled.
Only except for sexual desire.
If one has already made offerings to the sages in accordance with the Dharma.
Chew incense and recite ten thousand times.
Wherever one goes, those who see and hear will be delighted.

original: 又早起淨浴著新淨衣誦千遍者。
analyzed: 又早起淨浴著新淨衣誦千遍者。
translated: Moreover, if one gets up early, takes a clean bath, puts on new clean clothes and recites one thousand times,
Suddenly, there is a famine with no food.
This person is always abundant wherever they are.
Also, at midnight and in the early morning, scoop water and sprinkle it on the body.
Recite as much as one can.
One will be free from all fears.

original: 又加持齒木千遍然嚼用。
analyzed: 又加持齒木千遍然嚼用。
translated: Also, consecrate tooth wood a thousand times and then chew it.

original: 即得辯才令一切人敬愛。
analyzed: 即得辯才令一切人敬愛。
translated: One will attain eloquence and cause all people to respect and love.
Also, consecrate good flowers and first smell them oneself.
Then give them to others.
All will cherish and respect them as one wishes.
Also, one can sit upright and recite as much as one can.
One will always attain peace and joy.

original: 又於寢處端坐誦八千遍。
analyzed: 又於寢處端坐誦八千遍。
translated: Also, sit upright in one's sleeping quarters and recite eight thousand times.
Whatever one seeks, one's wishes will all be fulfilled.
Only excluding desire for form.

original: 又凡誦八千遍能護自他。
analyzed: 又凡誦八千遍能護自他。
translated: Also, in general, reciting eight thousand times can protect oneself and others.
Also, take cow dung that has not yet fallen on the ground.
Mix it with water to make mud.

original: 於佛法僧及本尊前磨作壇。
analyzed: 於佛法僧及本尊前磨作壇。
translated: Make an altar in front of the Buddha, Dharma, Sangha, and one's own deity.
Scatter flowers with fragrance on it.
Light a lamp of cow ghee.
Sit facing east and recite 10,000 times.
Then sleep on the three-ribbed grass in that place.

original: 心所求事皆具說之一不謬忘。
analyzed: 心所求事皆具說之一不謬忘。
translated: All the things you seek will be fully explained, not mistaken or forgotten.

original: 又白月一日如前取瞿摩夷作壇。
analyzed: 又白月一日如前取瞿摩夷作壇。
translated: Also, on the first day of the bright fortnight, take cow bezoar as before to make an altar.
Scatter fragrant flowers on it.

original: 然三盞燈誦三千五百遍。
analyzed: 然三盞燈誦三千五百遍。
translated: Light three lamps and recite 3,500 times.

original: 明早得四箇迦利沙半那。
analyzed: 明早得四箇迦利沙半那。
translated: In the early morning, you will obtain four kārṣāpaṇas.
Also, in a stūpa or in front of a Buddha image,
Grind small pieces of sandalwood incense into four small altars.

original: 各置酥燈誦三千五百遍。
analyzed: 各置酥燈誦三千五百遍。
translated: Place ghee lamps and recite 3,500 times.

original: 隨為何人除厄難及惡事皆得消滅。
analyzed: 隨為何人除厄難及惡事皆得消滅。
translated: For whomever it is, it will remove calamities and misfortunes and all bad things will be eliminated.
Also, take cow bezoar.
First mix it with water and apply it to the ground.
Then make offerings to the Buddha, Dharma, and Saṃgha, as well as to the principal deity.

original: 以白檀香水作四小圓壇。
analyzed: 以白檀香水作四小圓壇。
translated: With white sandalwood and perfumed water, make four small round altars.
Scatter flowers on them and recite 10,000 times a day.

original: 乃至七日已即得種種衣服。
analyzed: 乃至七日已即得種種衣服。
translated: After seven days, you will obtain various clothes.
Also, offer incense and flowers to the deity.
Light four butter lamps and recite ten thousand times.
On the twenty-first day, do as above.

original: 又於直入海河泉水岸上。
analyzed: 又於直入海河泉水岸上。
translated: Also, on the bank of a river or spring that flows directly into the ocean,
face west and install the deity's image.

original: 以瞿摩夷塗地供養香花。
analyzed: 以瞿摩夷塗地供養香花。
translated: Anoint the ground with cow dung and offer incense and flowers.

original: 行人面東誦三十五萬遍。
analyzed: 行人面東誦三十五萬遍。
translated: The practitioner faces east and recites 350,000 times.

original: 從此已後此國土風雨順時五穀成熟更誦一萬遍燒涅摩落花。
analyzed: 從此已後此國土風雨順時五穀成熟更誦一萬遍燒涅摩落花。
translated: From this point onward, in this country, the wind and rain will be timely, the five grains will ripen, and by reciting an additional ten thousand times and burning neem flowers,

original: 於此境界惡猛風雨停息獻殘花也。
analyzed: 於此境界惡猛風雨停息獻殘花也。
translated: the violent wind and rain in this area will cease. Offer the remaining flowers.
Also, wherever there is a sudden calamity,

original: 將本尊於城門前如法安置。
analyzed: 將本尊於城門前如法安置。
translated: bring the deity to the front of the city gate and install it according to the Dharma.

original: 禮拜供養種種香花飲食。
analyzed: 禮拜供養種種香花飲食。
translated: Worship and make offerings of various incense, flowers, and food.
The calamity will then cease.
Also, with the remaining flowers offered to the sages,

original: 加持八千遍蓋於彼極患壯熱病人頭。
analyzed: 加持八千遍蓋於彼極患壯熱病人頭。
translated: empower them 8,000 times and cover the head of the extremely ill person with fever.

original: 上及以和酥燒薰其病者。
analyzed: 上及以和酥燒薰其病者。
translated: Mix it with ghee and burn it to fumigate the patient.
The severe heat will then be cured.

Perform homa with the medicine.
Think of whatever person, recite their name as above.

original: 若加持其七遍其人火急即至。
analyzed: 若加持其七遍其人火急即至。
translated: If you empower it seven times, that person will quickly arrive.

original: 又先受八戒誦八千遍已。
analyzed: 又先受八戒誦八千遍已。
translated: Also, first observe the eight precepts and recite 8,000 times.

original: 令好手畫人亦受八戒先教持誦阿唎多囉真言。
analyzed: 令好手畫人亦受八戒先教持誦阿唎多囉真言。
translated: Have a skilled painter also observe the eight precepts, first teach them to recite the Aritara mantra.
Paint an image of Bhīṣma.

original: 像前安四枚阿悉伐二合樹葉。
analyzed: 像前安四枚阿悉伐二合樹葉。
translated: In front of the image, place four leaves of the Asvattha tree.
Take ivory and beans.
Also use Manah-shri
and Siddharaja.
Either take three or eight ounces.
Place the above three ingredients on the front leaf.
Also use three leaves to cover the medicine.

original: 或用八日十五日或月蝕時。
analyzed: 或用八日十五日或月蝕時。
translated: Either use the eighth day, fifteenth day, or when there is a lunar eclipse.
Consecrate the medicine and recite continuously.

original: 比現三相隨得上中下悉地。
analyzed: 比現三相隨得上中下悉地。
translated: When the three signs appear, one will attain the higher, middling, and lower siddhis accordingly.
I will now explain the method separately.
First, observe the eight precepts and beg for food.

original: 日時香湯洗浴著新淨衣。
analyzed: 日時香湯洗浴著新淨衣。
translated: At mealtime, wash with fragrant hot water and put on new clean clothes.
Give rise to the great bodhi mind and cut off greed and desire.
Toward all sentient beings, give rise to a compassionate mind.

original: 或於塔中或於佛前誦三洛叉。
analyzed: 或於塔中或於佛前誦三洛叉。
translated: Either in a stupa or in front of the Buddha, recite three lakh times.

original: 然淨㲲上畫觀自在菩薩。
analyzed: 然淨㲲上畫觀自在菩薩。
translated: Then, on a clean cloth, paint Avalokiteshvara Bodhisattva.
Holding a lotus flower in his hand,
standing on a lotus flower, he should be painted black.
Adorned with jewels.
The topknot points upward.
Wrap a fine white cloth around both shoulders.
After drawing, place it in a stūpa containing relics.

original: 三日不食像前設大供養。
analyzed: 三日不食像前設大供養。
translated: Do not eat for three days, and make a great offering in front of the image.

original: 用體悉二合多木和酥蜜。
analyzed: 用體悉二合多木和酥蜜。
translated: Use bilva wood mixed with ghee and honey.
Perform homa 24,000 times.
Then the image emits light.
Either the earth moves or one hears the sound of drums.
Or the flame of the lamp gradually grows longer or the flowers move.

original: 若見如是相即知以悉地。
analyzed: 若見如是相即知以悉地。
translated: If one sees such signs, one should know that it is siddhi.

original: 能滅一切諸惡已蒙本尊恒為護持。
analyzed: 能滅一切諸惡已蒙本尊恒為護持。
translated: One can extinguish all evils and always be protected by the deity.
All great wishes that one seeks will be accomplished with ease.
Those who see this person will love and respect him.

original: 又以阿師伐二合馱樹葉。🔽著蘇嚕二合馱安闍那。
analyzed: 又以阿師伐二合馱樹葉。 著蘇嚕二合馱安闍那。
translated: Moreover, use the leaves of the aśvattha tree.🔽Place them in a suradānava.
In front of the image, perform the empowerment without interruption.
When the three signs appear, one attains the three siddhis.
Moreover, bathe three times a day with fragrant hot water.
And change into clean clothes. Eat the food obtained by begging.
As prescribed, make offerings and recite three lakṣas.

original: 然或二十三日或二十九日。
analyzed: 然或二十三日或二十九日。
translated: Then, on the twenty-third or twenty-ninth day,
with black sesame mixed with the three sweets,
perform homa eight thousand times.
You will obtain one thousand kārṣāpaṇa coins.

original: 又口含菖蒲根無限念誦。
analyzed: 又口含菖蒲根無限念誦。
translated: Also, hold mugwort root in the mouth and recite without limit.
When the three signs appear, you will attain the three kinds of spiritual powers.
Heat means being intelligent.
Smoke means becoming invisible.
Fire means riding on empty space. You should know this in order.
Also, with sandalwood wood,

original: 長六指或十二指作齒木。
analyzed: 長六指或十二指作齒木。
translated: make toothpicks six or twelve finger-widths long.
First, recite three lakṣas.

original: 即白月十五日像前無間念誦比三相現得三悉地。
analyzed: 即白月十五日像前無間念誦比三相現得三悉地。
translated: Then, on the fifteenth day of the bright fortnight, in front of the image, recite continuously until the three signs appear. You will attain the three kinds of spiritual powers.
Also, on the first day of the first month, observe the eight precepts,
bathe three times a day, and recite one laksa.
Then, draw a picture of Aritara,
the color like sandalwood, sitting on a lotus flower,
adorned with various jewels, with hair in a topknot,
holding a lotus in the left hand and a fruit in the right hand.
Wearing white upper garments and a flower crown.
With a compassionate expression, looking at the practitioner.
After painting, place it in a stūpa containing relics.
Use white lotus flowers for homa one lakh times.
One will then become the king among all vidyādhara sages.
Always dwelling together with the sages.
One will also be able to travel to the Land of Ultimate Bliss.

original: 亦能降伏大梵天王從座而下。
analyzed: 亦能降伏大梵天王從座而下。
translated: One will also be able to subdue the great Brahmā Heaven King and descend from his seat.
One will also become the lord of the four continents.
Wherever one thinks of, one will attain mastery.

original: 亦得親見一切諸佛延壽一劫。
analyzed: 亦得親見一切諸佛延壽一劫。
translated: One will also be able to personally see all buddhas and extend one's lifespan for an eon.
Moreover, if one wishes to quickly attain siddhi,

original: 乞食日時洗浴香湯如法洗已。
analyzed: 乞食日時洗浴香湯如法洗已。
translated: at mealtime, wash in fragrant hot water as prescribed.
Recite fifty lakh times, and one will definitely attain siddhi.
All desired matters will be fulfilled.
Furthermore, make a tube with white ivory,
and adorn it with gold on the outside.

original: 於內盛摩那多二合悉囉雄黃藥。
analyzed: 於內盛摩那多二合悉囉雄黃藥。
translated: Inside, store the medicine manasikāra siddhi and realgar.
Place it in front of the image and recite an unlimited number of times.
Empower this medicine tube.
When the three signs appear, one will attain the three kinds of siddhis.
Moreover, first recite sixteen lakṣas in front of the image.
Then place the image in a stūpa.
Cover it with white cloth and recite continuously.
When the image emits fire,
one will be able to ride through the sky with over a thousand people.

original: 又不語於像前坐三稜草誦十六洛叉。
analyzed: 又不語於像前坐三稜草誦十六洛叉。
translated: Moreover, sit on three-pronged grass in front of the image and recite sixteen lakṣas.

original: 白月取烏曇婆羅木護摩八千。
analyzed: 白月取烏曇婆羅木護摩八千。
translated: On the bright moon, take udumbara wood and perform homa eight thousand times.
One will be able to cure all illnesses without exception.
Moreover, enter water up to the navel and recite one lakṣa.

original: 能見一切地中伏藏能破一切阿脩羅宮。
analyzed: 能見一切地中伏藏能破一切阿脩羅宮。
translated: One will be able to see all hidden treasures in the ground, be able to destroy all asura palaces,
be able to bind all fire gods,
be able to establish boundaries, be able to summon all dragons,
be able to revive the dead,
and also be able to perform śāntika rites.

original: 亦能作烏闍阿二合多那二合陀也亦能攝喚亦能令諸毒消除。
analyzed: 亦能作烏闍阿二合多那二合陀也亦能攝喚亦能令諸毒消除。
translated: One will also be able to perform pauṣṭika rites, be able to summon, and be able to eliminate all poisons.
All poisonous and evil beings will be subdued.
It can also give birth to sons and daughters for them.

original: 加持八千一切戰陣皆勝。
analyzed: 加持八千一切戰陣皆勝。
translated: Empowered, one will win all battles of eight thousand.
It can also subdue external enemies.

original: 又以多唎二合路訶三金即金銀銅長六指許作蓮華。
analyzed: 又以多唎二合路訶三金即金銀銅長六指許作蓮華。
translated: Also, using dāru (wood), gold, silver, and copper, each six fingers long, make a lotus flower.
Bathe three times a day with fragrant hot water.
Do not speak with anyone.
Recite five lakh times in a stupa.
Then make offerings for three days without eating.
Hold the lotus flower and recite continuously.
Like a fire, it will blaze.
One can take three thousand people and ride through the sky.
One can be born in the Land of Ultimate Bliss.

original: 與一切聖者等一切菩薩同住。
analyzed: 與一切聖者等一切菩薩同住。
translated: Dwell together with all holy beings and all bodhisattvas.

original: 又食大麥食日三浴三換衣誦一俱胝。
analyzed: 又食大麥食日三浴三換衣誦一俱胝。
translated: Also, eating barley, bathing three times a day, changing clothes three times, and reciting one koṭi,

original: 得心中悉地。🔽又畫觀自在像如前法。
analyzed: 得心中悉地。 又畫觀自在像如前法。
translated: One will attain mental siddhi.🔽Also, paint an image of Avalokiteśvara as before.
On the right side, add a painting of Ārya Tārā Bodhisattva.

original: 立於蓮花臺上身色如檀木。
analyzed: 立於蓮花臺上身色如檀木。
translated: Standing on a lotus platform, the body is the color of sandalwood.
The hair is adorned with jewels, tied up high,

original: 戴蓮花冠著白天衣合掌恭敬作禮自在狀。
analyzed: 戴蓮花冠著白天衣合掌恭敬作禮自在狀。
translated: Wearing a lotus flower crown, wearing white clothes, with palms joined in respect, making obeisance with a self-reliant manner.

original: 畫已設大供養誦三洛叉。
analyzed: 畫已設大供養誦三洛叉。
translated: After drawing, make extensive offerings and recite three lakh times.
One will attain all siddhis in the mind.

original: 爾時觀自在菩薩摩訶薩。
analyzed: 爾時觀自在菩薩摩訶薩。
translated: At that time, Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva Mahāsattva,

original: 說此微妙祕密甚深法已。
analyzed: 說此微妙祕密甚深法已。
translated: Having spoken this subtle, secret, and profound Dharma,
The great assembly of bodhisattvas in the gathering,
The eight groups of devas, nāgas, and all vajra beings,

original: 聞是法已皆大歡喜禮佛而退。
analyzed: 聞是法已皆大歡喜禮佛而退。
translated: Having heard this Dharma, all greatly rejoiced, bowed to the Buddha, and withdrew.
The Sūtra of Aritara Aruhe
